requirement.title: Take-Off
requirement.description: The airplane shall be launched by a single person by throwing the plane.

requirement.title: Climbing
requirement.description: The airplane shall climb to a predefined altitude (tolerance $\pm\SI{5}{\meter}$) and predefined velocity (tolerance $\pm 25\%$) after launch and circle the launch site at this altitude (radius tolerance $\pm\SI{3}{\meter}$).

requirement.title: Mission
requirement.description: The airplane shall be able to follow a predefined set of waypoints, consisting of latitude, longitude and altitude. Each waypoint should be traversed with a tolerance of $\pm\SI{2}{\meter}$ horizontally and $\SI{5}{\meter}$ vertically at a predefined velocity (tolerance $\pm 25\%$).

requirement.title: Landing
requirement.description: The airplane shall be able to land at a predefined landing position with an accuracy of $\pm\SI{2}{\meter}$ orthogonal to the landing direction and $\pm\SI{10}{\meter}$ in the landing direction.

requirement.title: Range
requirement.description: The airplane minimum range of the aircraft shall be 100km

requirement.title: Error Handling
requirement.description: The airplane shall provide all information required for finding errors, both on the ground and when loitering.
